Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Point-Blank Shot: Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Snagging Strike: May make a Strike that inflicts flat-footed on target for 1 rd if successful
